desc:
30% boost to all parameters of Fire types & damage taken may boost BB gauge
Guild Raid: 5% damage reduction from Earth Element types

dictionary.lore: An orb crafted from the essence of fire, it softly hums with power. This is one of the first creations from Noel's workshop with the newly discovered Vardket technology, and is a promising start for future artifacts of power.

name: Pyre Orb
